title: Create test case with Record and Playback in Katalon Studio
description: Test recording is the easiest way for new automation testers to start learning test automation. Identifying objects on applications is time-consuming. The Web Recorder Utility function captures your actions being performed on the application and converts them into runnable code in the back-end.
